intro: Psychotria hawaiiensis var. hillebrandii, commonly known as the Hawaiian psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Hawaiian Islands. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. This species is characterized by its small, fragrant flowers that are typically white or pale pink. The plant grows as a shrub or small tree, often found in moist, shaded forest environments. It plays a role in the ecological diversity of Hawaii's native flora.
